mapper.select: SELECT #{userId} AS userId, #{friendId} AS friendId, u.nickname AS friendName, COUNT(*) AS count, MAX(r.date) as latestDate FROM race r JOIN user u ON (r.user_id = u.id OR r.partner_id = u.id) WHERE ((r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.partner_id = #{friendId}) OR (r.user_id = #{friendId} AND r.partner_id = #{userId})) AND (r.user_id=#{friendId}) GROUP BY u.nickname, u.id;
